commit.message:
re PR debug/48928 (ICE: in decimal_to_decnumber, at dfp.c:113 with -O -g and decimal float)

	PR debug/48928
	* dfp.c (decimal_to_decnumber): Handle conversion from
	dconst{1,2,m1,half}.

	* gcc.dg/dfp/pr48928.c: New test.

From-SVN: r173606
